last_episode_to_air.name: Futago no Haha Seihonnou
last_episode_to_air.overview: One day, Minoru receives a stray email, the email was sent by a woman named Akane. Somehow, he felt as if he knew him, but he couldn't understand how he felt. The next thing happened. When he and Tomoe returned home after shopping, they ran into Akane. Seeing Akane, Tomoe put on a strange face. Placing him between them, they looked at each other. Are their meetings just coincidence or deliberate? After revealing their true relationship, Minoru loses access and makes him the object of his play.

name: Futago no Haha Seihonnou
overview: One day, Minoru receives a stray email, the email was sent by a woman named Akane. Somehow, he felt as if he knew him, but he couldn't understand how he felt. The next thing happened. When he and Tomoe returned home after shopping, they ran into Akane. Seeing Akane, Tomoe put on a strange face. Placing him between them, they looked at each other. Are their meetings just coincidence or deliberate? After revealing their true relationship, Minoru loses access and makes him the object of his play.
